name: Mystery Case Files: Broken Hour Collector's Edition
name_original: Mystery Case Files: Broken Hour Collector's Edition
description:
Mystery Case Files: Broken Hour Collector's Edition is a casual adventure game developed by Eipix Entertainment. It came out on 22-11-2016. Big Fish Games published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Mystery Case Files: Broken Hour Collector's Edition is available on PC.
